metadata.title: CVE-2024-35945 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:phy: phy_device: Prevent nullptr exceptions on ISR If phydev->irq is setunconditionally, check for valid interrupt handler or fall back to pollingmode to prevent nullptr exceptions in interrupt service routine.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
